As Global EMO Support planner you are responsible for handling urgent material requests from all around the world. This is done by solving complex Supply Chain challenges, while communicating constructively with all stakeholders in the process.

job_name: [Taiwan Pipeline] CS - Field Application Engineer - Linkou - req29327
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction
Application engineer plays a unique role as technology enabler to support our customers continuously develop  lithography technology by introducing new function and providing customized solution 

Job Mission
Application engineer supports ASML product in 3 phases:
•Business development: translate customer requirement into potential business development
•New product introduction: new platform insertion in customer R&D / Pilot Fab 
•High volume manufacturing: sustain installed base machine for on product performance issues 

Job Description
• Support new product business development include bridging D&E ideas and customer requirements/demands. 
• Familiar with semiconductor litho-process, optical & metrology mechanism, able to do on product troubleshooting under time pressure 
• Able to understand customer’s needs and clearly describe the issues that customer is facing to internal stakeholders
• Act as the owner of customer requests and follow through. (customer interfacing, data collection, 1st hand analysis, etc) 
• Escalate/Communicate the issues to ASML experts in headquarter when needed without losing the ownership. Drive for progress and containment/solution 
• Able work and coordinate across departments to ensure smooth troubleshooting process 
• Able to present and report clearly during internal and external meetings.

Education
Master of Optical/Physical engineering, Material/Chemical science, Mechanical engineering

Experience
3 - 5 years in semiconductor industry, litho process or equipment engineering or optical engineering

Personal skills
•Excellent English presentation and communication skills to interface internal (business development managers, project leaders, management) and external customers (mainly execution and mid to high management level).
•Troubleshooting skill, basic project management 
•Basic programming skill (Matlab) will be plus 

Context of the position
This position is based in Linkou or Taichung, should be able to travel between Linkou, Hsinchu, Taichung, Kaohsiung also., working together with leading semiconductor or memory customer. To fulfill customer’s needs, Application engineer always looking for potential improvement beyond current machine spec with supporting from different department (D&E/marketing/equipment engineering). Application engineer is creating value by integration of multiple professional area.

Other information
High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

job_name: D&E - YieldStar Mechatronic Design Engineer - Linkou - J-00240843-417
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the department ACE YieldStar Engineering is responsible for engineering aspects of the YieldStar product line. This includes Development, Production, Installed base support, Supply Chain support, Repairs, System refurbishment support and customer specials. Mechatronics is concerned with high speed and precise moving parts in the ASML machines, in particular wafer handling, positioning and alignment. The main focus is on cost effective execution and life cycle management. The department’s competences will cover the whole technical spectrum of the metrology equipment: control, dynamics, mechatronics, position measurement systems, imaging applications, overlay applications, focus applications, productivity, software, optics and illumination. 

Role and responsibilities
To contribute to the development of the YieldStar product and to contribute to the precision mechatronic aspects related to manufacturing of YiledStar systems and trouble shooting, resulting in quick fixes and structural solutions.
Develop and implement design improvements in close cooperation within the multidisciplinary team. 
Support the Manufacturing and Customer Support organization to meet the output and quality requirements. 

The function to be filled in ACE (ASML Taiwan, Linkou) 
During the knowledge transfer phase quite some alignment  / knowledge transfer with ASML Headquarters (Netherlands) is expected. Candidate must be able to spend part of a 12 month period travelling back and forth between Taiwan and the Netherlands. High flexibility is a must.

•Inventing construction principles and joint building strategies for the precise positioning of complex dynamic mechanical systems.
•Carrying out design analyses into machinery and mechanical (semi-) systems.
•Fills a general advisory position in the field of precision engineering and is therefore responsible for the correct application of precision engineering principles when developing metrology systems.
•Specifies, re-design and optimize all the precision mechatronic aspects of the YieldStar modules in order to meet the system performance. 
•Designs and realizes test equipment and is responsible for ensuring that prototypes are built and tests are carried out. 
•Is responsible for the technical product documentation in order to unambiguously explain the design to suppliers.
•Contribute to the YieldStar master plan by making a realistic work break down.
•Support YieldStar manufacturing and customer support organization with high end troubleshooting
•Optimizing quality of the mechatronic aspects of the YieldStar modules.


Education and experience
University degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering

> 5 years experience with precision mechanical motion stage design, automatic machine design, servo motion control experience, and repairs/refurbishments of multi-disciplinary equipment like measurement tools, positioning tools, assemblies etc. are an advantage.
Experience in Quality & Efficiency improvement projects in both the production and development environment are an advantage. 
Experience in integration of precision mechanical motion stage with interferometer feedback system 

Skills
Candidate must be familiar with Matlab program. 
Candidate must be familiar with motion control design algorithm and mechatronics design principle. 
Candidate must have a strong technical leadership and drive the development to a quality result and work effectively in a team.
Team player able to convince others with different cultural backgrounds. 
Strong analytical ability with a pragmatic attitude. 
Professional communication. 
Self driven, pro-active, hands-on and get-it-done mentality based on technical arguments. 
Good knowledge of English.
Wave optic knowledge is a plus.
Interferometer knowledge is a plus.

job_name: [TW Pipeline] CSCM - Global Operations Center Group Leader (12-hr day/night shift) - Linkou - req54247
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Do you like challenges and do you want to work in a fast pacing supply chain environment to support some of the biggest semiconductor companies worldwide? Are you familiar with Logistics Operations and like to managing urgent demands on a daily basis? 
If this sounds like you and if you have a strong customer oriented mindset, here is your mission.

Role and responsibilities
For our Global Operations Center in Taichung in Taiwan we are searching for Supply Chain Professionals. You fulfill the demand of our customers for spare parts and tools for their maintenance activities on some of the most complex machines in the right quantity and at the right time & cost.
Time is of the essence to ensure a seamless production of our customers without interruptions on our machines.

-Handling of urgent material requests from worldwide customers in a rolling 24/7 shift system with the right customer focus, while meeting all milestones related to communication and execution
-Monitoring of worldwide shipments 
-Constructive and reliable communication with worldwide stakeholders from all departments within ASML
-Organizing shift schedules for team members
-Train and coach and develop team member for driving continuous improvement including process, soft/ hard skill, R&R and team structure
-Prioritize the GOC activities based on their impact on department goals and overall strategy

Education and experience
Relevant Master degree preferred (e.g. Supply Chain Management, Industrial Engineering & Management Science, Business Administration or Engineering) 

-Knowledge of business complexity, supply chain and/or relevant industry
-Above 3 years of relevant experience in an international company, semiconductor industry is preferred
-2-5 years of people management experience
-A tactical thinker with strong interpersonal and communication skills
-Analytical thinking and ability to organize and prioritize workload


Skills
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

-Stress-resistant; act under high pressure
-Flexible; willing to go the extra mile for the customer
-Excellent professional communication in English, written and oral
-Drive for results; does not stop until solution has been found, even when obstacles arise
-Team player
-Change management competencies
-Convincing, pro-active and “can do” mentality
-Cultural awareness
-Experience with ERP system(s), SAP R/3 knowledge preferred
-Ability to prioritize
-Proven skills in project management and execution is plus

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
Customer Supply Chain is responsible for availability of spare parts & tools at customer locations. As Global EMO Support Shift Leader you are responsible for handling urgent material requests from all around the world. This is done by solving complex Supply Chain challenges, while communicating constructively with all stakeholders in the process.

ASML has an industry-leading supply-chain management organization, responsible for ensuring material availability to ASML’s factories and customers. Our DNA contains customer focus, concurrent engineering, virtual integration plus the ability to thrive in a volatile market, accelerate the supply chain and deliver creative solutions.

job_name: CRE - Environmental Management Specialist - Linkou - J-00252923-327
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
The main objective of the Environmental Management Specialist is to develop, implement and maintain a regional wide consistent approach (policies, practices and competences) on environmental management. All of this based on and executed within CRE’s strategic pillars (Safety, TCO, Flexibility, Business Alignment, Wellbeing and Sustainability).

Role and responsibilities
1.Responsible Regulatory and compliance, ISO 14001 management and coordination (Asia Region), 
2.CRE TW/SG sustainability program management, Defining & Report Trends and Analyses and the associated reporting to corporate and to the government.
3.Manage, monitor and maintain the required operation permits of CRE activities
4.Implement and Maintain the process/procedures (L4 – L5) and streamline the applicable methods/protocols used in the field. 
5.Execute EHS-audits according plan: Safety in projects, Environmental, CRE-processes and procedures. 
6.Connect to other (sr.)experts (routines), e.g. CRE Competence and CRE EHS.
7.Execute projects and daily work as a senior expert on Environmental Management in the Region.  
8.Represent the CRE Region TW/SG (factories and offices) in meetings, e.g. pillar meetings environmental and sustainability.
9.From helicopter view on engineering & maintenance, project management and risk management determine the areas that are subject to technical asset safety and develop policies for each specific area and design the compliance process.
10.Ensure compliance to insurance requirements, laws, regulations and other performance objectives(i.e. certifications, labels, indexes). Interfacing with the insurance company on technical issues; representing CRE Region TW/SG in technical discussions with ASML insurance management and external insurers.
11.Continuously develop state of the art knowledge on asset safety and identify opportunities for process system and technical improvements.
12.Drive improvements from advise to decision-making to execution together with competence experts.
13.Perform root cause analysis or engineering/compliance reviews and drive solutions for improvements (compliance manager).
14.Maintain and provide access to an active professional network outside ASML and share the best known methods with other sites.


Education and experience
BSc / Master in engineering or technical study, supplemented with Safety and/or Environmental studies
10+ years of relevant work experience; construction/renovation projects in international high tech production (preferred cleanroom) environments

Skills
Good relational skills, capable of handling cultural and political barriers;
Ability to work in a highly demanding and fast-changing technological environment;
Can build relationships with stakeholders ranging from senior management to technical professionals to construction workers;
Team player with a pro-active and communicative personality who is able to act  and to ensure stakeholder satisfaction;
Ability to handle multiple requests and work on management and operational level;
Strategic focus (helicopter view) combined with analytical thinking
Ability to accurately complete task assignments and responsibilities in a timely manner;
Understands the implications of different (technical) choices and is able to direct to the best solution

Other information
Decide about/approve designs, construction plans and solutions related to the environmental management.
Decide about/approve upon safety situations as functional owner and act with mandate to either change or interface when (severe) risks are identified
Decide upon guidelines and standards that are leading for managing and maintaining the assets in a safe, environmentally responsible and secure manner, contributing to the optimal performance for ASML in the region
Decide upon (other or specialist) expertise to acquire for in-depth analysis, studies or engineering work.

job_name: IT - Core IT Infra Engineer / Coordinator - Linkou - J-00259453-511
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Founded in 1984, ASML is the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits and chips. ASML has its R&D and manufacturing operations in the United States, China, Taiwan, Korea and in Veldhoven, the Netherlands employing over 30,000 people.

The IT organization of ASML supports information management, infrastructure and key business processes across ASML. Part of the IT organization is the Core IT Services providing all, mission-critical, IT support services. This includes generic IT infrastructure services like laptops and desktops, telecom services, network and datacenters within ASML.

IT is striving for operational excellence by implementing extensive improvement programs to boost quality and reliability, to reduce costs and to minimize risks into our day-to-day operations. This means that the demand is high, also for our employees despite that ASML offers an environment with unique possibilities to learn, to grow and to develop skills and careers in multiple domains.

Role and responsibilities
Ensure ALL IaaS related equipment within our APAC Regional Datacenter and Local MER / SER’s are operational 24/7 & 365 days a year. To achieve this, you will be co-working with ASML’s Technical Landscape Owners and our External Service Providers to ensure sufficient operational budget has been requested and to ensure New Demands, Enhancements, Change Request are smoothly executed with incidents promptly resolved and logged via ServiceNow (ITIL tool).

In addition, you will managed / co-ordinate Office, Warehouse & Cleanroom renovation and relocation activities within TW, SG, JP using established ASML processes & procedures. Your work will include the planning and installation of structure cablings, building of MER / SER and to ensure all End Users Devices are correctly installed.

Handling of Infra related Incidents, Requests & Changes in accordance to set SLA and KPI using ITIL methodology and framework.
Infrastructure project coordination/execution in Taiwan, Singapore, Japan region including office relocation/installation/renovation.
Datacenter operation management with experience in setting up structure cabling, cooling and power.
Act as IaaS major technical contact to ensure ASML service & application availability.
Work with our External Service Provider to predict future growth, business requirement and to ensure sufficient resources and capacity.
Act as 3rd line support and point of contract for ALL Infra related questions and enquires within APAC region.
Support IT related equipment procurement process, Control IT cost/expense for Taiwan including the management of contracts for Taiwan Infra Team.
Willingness to travel domestic/internationally.

Education and experience
Bachelor Degree in Computing Science or related field preferred
Related IT (VCP, CCNA) & Project Management (Prince2, PMP or Agile) related certification would be advantageous.

> 5 years hands on Infra experience.
> 2 years Project Management experience.

Skills

To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Proficiency in the English language.
Ability to work independently and to communicate effectively within all levels of the company – Users, Peers, Management.
Manage one-to-many streams of work simultaneously.
Extraordinary interpersonal, project management and prioritization skills—both internally and externally.
Global perspective, multi-cultural understanding and approach.

job_name: CS - Field Application Engineer - Linkou - J-00265618-088
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
An application engineer plays an unique role as technology enabler to support our customer continuously development in lithography of semiconductor industry

Role and responsibilities
Application engineer supports ASML product in 3 phases:
- Business development: translate customer requirement into potential business development
- New product introduction: new platform insertion in customer R&D / Pilot Fab
- High volume manufacturing: sustain installed base machines for on product performance issues
• Help new product business development include bridging D&E idea and customer requirement/demand.
• Familiar with semiconductor litho-process, optical & metrology mechanism, able to do on product troubleshooting under time pressure
• Able to understand customer’s needs and clearly describe the issues that customer is facing to internal stakeholders
• Act as the owner of customer requests and follow through. (customer interfacing, data collection, 1st hand analysis, etc)
• Escalate/Communicate the issues to ASML experts in headquarter when needed without losing the ownership. Drive for progress and containment/solution
• Able work and coordinate across departments to ensure smooth troubleshooting process
• Able to present and report clearly during internal and external meetings.

Education and experience
Master of Optical/Physical engineering, Material/Chemical science, Mechanical engineering
3 - 5 years in semiconductor industry, optical engineering

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

•Excellent English presentation and communication skills to interface internal (business development managers, project leaders, management) and external customers (mainly execution and mid to high management level).
•Troubleshooting skill, basic project management
•Basic programming skill (Matlab/Python) will be plus

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
This position is based in Linkou, working together with leading edge semiconductor customers. To fulfill customer’s needs, Application engineer always looking for potential improvement beyond current machine spec with supporting from different department (D&E/marketing/equipment engineering). Application engineer is creating value by integration of multiple professional area.
High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

15+ years of relevant work experience; construction/renovation projects in international high tech production (preferred cleanroom) environments

job_name: S&SC - Procurement Account Manager (Sourcing Lead) - Linkou - J-00257202-312
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
The Sourcing Lead is responsible for the overall relationship between ASML and a set of its key suppliers. Current suppliers will be managed for QLTCS (Quality, Logistics, Technology, Cost and Sustainability) performance, while potential new suppliers will be discovered for future business as needed. This position requires a combination of skills in strategic thinking, leadership, initiative, professional communication, financial/business analysis, and is greatly aided by a background in engineering or technology.


Role and responsibilities
Strategically develops vision and targets of supplier landscape by pursuing critical technology roadmap and product roadmap in collaboration with category manager while considering regional needs.
Jointly defines and executes category strategy with Category PFT (Product Family Team) and strategic supplier account plans at suppliers.
Proactively monitors developments and trends within the supply base for Silicon Base Devices and ensures ASML is prepared to react appropriately for short, mid and long terms.
Drives supplier selection activities by leading one or more Sourcing Teams.
Prepares and presents for key decision making in executive review meetings, regarding make/buy decisions and supplier selections.
Negotiates Long Term Supply Agreements (LTSA), NPI Agreements, and associated addendums, and monitors contractual compliance of the supplier as well as ASML.
Drives continuous cost and lead time reduction.
Take lead to manage suppliers’ QLTCS performance with SAT (“Supplier Account Team”) through review processes on regular basis (eg ORM and ERM).
Prepares supplier spending forecasts and monitors supplier financial health.
Ensures all communication to the supplier is coordinated and consistent.
Drives supply base rationalization within the categories.
Participates in supplier overall capabilities audits and drives closure of findings and improvement plans.

Education and experience
Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain, Logistics Management, Engineering or related field is required or equivalent experience a minimum of 10 years of progressive experience in supplier management in a high-tech, international manufacturing environment.
A deep understanding of one or more technology-related supply chains is strongly preferred. Due to the strategic nature of the commodities/categories involved, a proven track record in developing strong business relationships with key suppliers and experience in developing and executing long term agreements is required.
Experience with complex negotiations, problem solving, strategic planning and financial analysis are essential.
Ability to travel domestically and internationally required.
Knowledge of continuous improvement techniques is a big plus and a strong familiarity with technology manufacturing is highly preferred.

Skills

To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Proficient with Microsoft Office (i.e. Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook).
Excellent written and verbal communications in English are essential. Negotiation skills are critical.
Operate effectively with all levels of management both internally and externally.
Ability to lead cross-functional teams is essential to performing the job.
Must be able to professionally represent ASML to outside companies/suppliers.
Ability to build a strong (internal and external) networks.
Ability to get buy-in and commitment from both internal and external stakeholders.
Willingness to “constructively dissent” and challenge management thinking on key issues.
Must thrive in an environment where multi-tasking is the norm.
Strong vision of supplier landscape, supply chain networks and technology roadmap.

cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Are you challenged by the engineering of high-tech semiconductor equipment products? And you are a Software Design Engineer with experience in C-programming, Embedded systems and VxWorks ? You’d better contact us today!

If you are experienced developer and would like to
Prove you are highly talented and ready to work in a multidisciplinary team.
Enjoy the challenge/problem solving of complex issues in multi-dimensional cause.
Make a difference to efficiency and profitability of ASML by performing the engineering change through the product life cycle.
Make your work to have a global impact.
Be involved with all aspects of our lithographic systems – not only the software but the full functionality.
Then, you shall fulfill the position of “MPS Design Engineer”. This is your chance to work in a multinational environment that also provides you complex technical and challenges.

Role and responsibilities
Business Line Mature Products and Services is responsible for PAS5500 PAS 55000 systems, the 200mm wafer Lithography systems of ASML. Our Design & Engineering team deliver the structural solution to supports PAS5500 installed base by providing refurbished systems, upgrades, spare-parts and service to our customers with long-term availability.

Part of long-term availability we start redesigns of all electronics in system to extend the PAS 5500 life-cycle to the year 2030 or beyond. For these redesigns the software team takes care of the definition, realization, qualification and integration of the software and firmware.

The position we are looking for is a software design engineer to cover software related deliverables.



Education and experience
Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science and Information Technology, Mathematics or equivalent.

5 years of experience with software designs, repairs, refurbishments of multi-disciplinary equipment like measurement tools, positioning systems, handling systems etc.
Embedded software in combination with related hardware.
Defining (re-)design requirements, implementation and qualification.
VX works, C, Solaris and the relevant configuration tools.
Adjustment of code within large existing code archives which are not all perfectly documented.
Control of sensors & actuators of measurement systems, motion systems, optical systems, illumination systems and handlers.
Good experience in implementing quality and/or efficiency improvement projects.
Experience in Quality & Efficiency improvement projects in both the production and development environment are an advantage.
Experience in Unix/Linux and computer network knowledge is a preferred. Sysadmin for Unix/Linux system, including installs of Unix/Linux software, configure, and maintaining of OS. Monitor, analyze, and resolve problems associated with software running on Unix/Linux OS. 

Skills
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Team player able to communicate professionally with colleagues and people with non-SW and/or different cultural backgrounds.
Strong analytical ability with a pragmatic attitude, able to quickly understand existing code.
Ability to identify root causes and develop/drive solutions.
Self-driven, pro-active, hands-on and get-it-done mentality based on technical arguments.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to interact with people from all levels in a professional manner.
Analytical, procedural, accurate and independent way of working.
Good English and Mandarin language skills.

job_name: [TW Pipeline] D&E - Software Designer (Java) - Linkou - req48767
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML, the sector Development and Engineering is responsible for the specification, design, integration, qualification, and sustaining of all ASML products. Taking advantage of customer and manufacturing proximity, the D&E Applications Software of the ASML Center of Excellence (ACE) is located in Linkou, Taiwan

Role and responsibilities
As a Java developer you will join one of our multinational Scrum teams to create state of the art software solutions. Teams are composed of five to ten developers, a Scrum Master and a Product Owner. 

All these dedicated Java teams work in unison on different products and platforms across ASML. Their domains are one or 
more of: (basically here are the different java teams explained in short).
• Creation of software infrastructure using Java EE which provides access to SQL and NoSQL storage, reliably manages job queues with switch-over and fail-over features, periodically collects of information from networked systems in the Fab and offers big-data-like storage and computational capabilities;
• Creation of a solution on-site that continuously monitors all scanners in a customer’s domain. The server can detect (upcoming) system failure and identify what corrective actions are needed;
• Providing industrial automation tasks that take care of unattended complex adjustments to the manufacturing process, to enable highest yields in High Volume 

Manufacturing;
• Development of algorithms that give our customers the power to reach optimal results during manufacturing; 
• Creation of applications that help fine-tune the manufacturing process, helping process engineers navigate the complexities of process set-up through excellent UX design;
• Creation of visualization and analytics applications, for visual performance monitoring and to help dig through huge amounts of data to pinpoint potential issues and solutions. 
For these applications, we use Spotfire and R as main technologies.
• Selection and management of IT infrastructure that helps us run the software on a multi-blade server with plenty of storage. In this area, we use virtualization technologies, Linux, Python and Splunk next to Java;
• Use emerging technologies to turn vision into reality, e.g. on big data and machine learning;

Education and experience
If you already have Java software development experience, and you are applying for a medior, or a senior position; you need to have the following experience:

• At least 4 years of Java SE or Java EE development
• Design and development of server-side software using object-oriented 
paradigm
• Creation of automated unit and integration tests using mocks and 
stubs
• Working with Continuous Integration
• Working as a part of a Scrum team
Having this experience is a plus:
• Creation of web-based user interfaces
If you are applying as a junior:
• 1 to 2 years of relevant Java experience. I.e. Java SE/EE 1.8 or newer;
• Development of server-side software using object-oriented paradigm;
• Creation of automated unit and integration tests using mocks and stubs;
Having this experience is a plus:
• Familiar with Continuous Integration;
• Having knowledge of, or already working as part of a Scrum team.
• Creation of web-based user interfaces

Skills
• You should first of all be passionate about technology and should be excited by the idea that his work will impact millions of end-users worldwide.
• You should be analytical, product and quality-oriented. 
• You like to investigate issues, you are creative in solving problems 
• You are open-minded, you like to discuss about technical challenges and you want to push the boundaries of technology.
• You are an innovator and you constantly seek to improve your knowledge and your work.
• You take ownership and you support your team, you are the backbone of your group.
• You are client and quality oriented – you do not settle for second best solutions, but you strive to find the best ways to acquire top results.

job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Are you aware of the fact that every electronic device costing €100 and up, contains a chip which is made with an ASML lithographic tool? Did you know that the next generation of tablets and smartphones is only made possible due to the fast evolving technological capabilities of ASML? 
More important, do you want to join us in shaping the future?

ASML is a high-tech fast growing Dutch company head-quartered near Eindhoven with local offices at our customers worldwide (e.g. Intel, IBM, Samsung) As market leader in the semiconductor industry ASML designs and manufactures complex lithographic systems. The customer service division consists of local offices at every customer site and a team of experts to support these local teams when complex technical problems are encountered.

Role and responsibilities
Job Mission
ASML produces high tech and high value tools. Downtime of these tools is very expensive for our customers. ASML Customer Support organization is responsible for the repair of the systems as soon as possible. As expert it is your mission to be the linking pin between problems seen at high tech customers and the solution.

Job Description
A role as Global Support Center (GSC) Engineer at ASML consists of a diversity of tasks and responsibilities:

1.Solving complex technical problems together with the local team most of the time remote, often on-site. (up to 30% of your time)
2.A continuous drive to stay updated and informed on new technologies, functionalities and products. Being eager to learn and absorb this knowledge are very valuable.
3.Sharing knowledge and expertise amongst colleagues within the GSC and with local engineers to increase the efficiency of our customer service. Travelling on-site when new system types are introduced to customers is an example of this aspect. 
The diversity of technical problems encountered in the “Bottom module – wafer stage and wafer handler” team requires a broad knowledge level. This makes that a GSC bottom engineer grows very valuable general system knowledge. For this reason a job within this team is an excellent starting function for a career in a high tech environment. Growth possibilities in both technical and managerial directions can be thought of. 

Bottom module – wafer stage and wafer handler
Top as the science of servo control and mechanism is very diverse. Within the context of ASML, the general purpose of bottom module to ensure fast and accurate wafer transfer, optimize servo control to be able to position wafer as required set points and have overall system knowledge of relevant subsystems to ensure nanometer accuracy during exposures.

Education and experience
Education
Master degree in technical science (Physics, Mechatronics, Electronics, Chemistry, Aerospace Engineering, Process technology, etc.) or equivalent experience is desired.

Experience
• Knowledge of ASML equipment on a specialized technical level is a pre

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.

•“Get things done” mentality
•Pro-active attitude

•Interpersonal abilities (Can relate well to others, both colleagues and customers)
•Effective communicator in English (both oral and written)
•Customer-oriented

job_detail:
Introduction to the job
ASML is a high-tech fast growing Dutch company head-quartered near Eindhoven with local offices at our customers worldwide (e.g. Intel, IBM, Samsung) As market leader in the semiconductor industry ASML designs and manufactures complex lithographic systems. The customer service division consists of local offices at every customer site and a team of experts to support these local teams when complex technical problems are encountered.

ASML produces high tech and high value tools. Downtime of these tools is very expensive for our customers. ASML Customer Support organization is responsible for the repair of the systems as soon as possible. As expert it is your mission to be the linking pin between problems seen at high tech customers and the solution.

Role and responsibilities
A role as Global Support Center (GSC) Engineer at ASML consists of a diversity of tasks and responsibilities:-Solving complex technical problems together with the local team most of the time remote, often on-site. (up to 30% of your time)
-A continuous drive to stay updated and informed on new technologies, functionalities and products. Being eager to learn and absorb this knowledge are very valuable.
-Sharing knowledge and expertise amongst colleagues within the GSC and with local engineers to increase the efficiency of our customer service. Travelling on-site when new system types are introduced to customers is an example of this aspect. 
The diversity of technical problems encountered in the “Metrology and Sensors” team requires a broad knowledge level. This makes that a GSC metrology engineer grows very valuable general system knowledge. For this reason a job within this team is an excellent starting function for a career in a high tech environment. Growth possibilities in both technical and managerial directions can be thought of.
Software
Software as in technology world comes with very wide coverage. Within the context of ASML, Software is one of the integral part of ASML data synchronized. The general purpose of Software is to be able to provide a data connection to all relevant subsystems to ensure nanometer accuracy during measurements and exposures.

Education and experience
Bachelor/Master degree in technical science (Computer Science, IT, Physics, Mechatronics, Electronics, etc.) or equivalent experience is desired.

Knowledge of ASML equipment on a specialized technical level is a preferred.

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

-“Get things done” mentality
-Pro-active attitude
-Strong analytical skills
-Interpersonal abilities (Can relate well to others, both colleagues and customers)
-Effective communicator in English (both oral and written)
-Customer-oriented
-Flexible in working hours, travel and work environments
-Team player
-Stress resistant

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.
major: 工程學科類 資訊工程相關

job_name: D&E - MPS Electronic Design Engineer - Linkou - J-00261476-975
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction
Delivering the technical solutions requires not only the knowledge/experience, but also teamwork, organizational, and communication skills. If you are experienced developer and would like to
-Prove you are highly talented and ready to work in a multidisciplinary team.
-Enjoy the challenge/problem solving of complex issues in multi-dimensional cause.
-Make a difference to efficiency and profitability of ASML by performing the engineering change through the product life cycle.
-Make your work to have a global impact.

Job Mission
-Contribute to the development of the PAS5500 product line by re-designing, creating and testing sub-systems, within the restrictions imposed on system specifications, costs and planning considerations.
-Manage the Development Projects by co-working with Internal/External stakeholders and integrate the solutions into PAS5500 systems.
-Lead the electronic aspects related to repairs and refurbishment of PAS systems and trouble shooting, resulting in both quick fixes and structural solutions.
-Support the Manufacturing and Customer Support organization to meet the output and quality requirements and high end trouble shooting.
-Introduce the Engineering Change to Manufacturing and Customer Support organization and also support the Supplier to meet the output and quality requirements.

Job Description
-Responsible for the technical product documentation using 3D modeling, BOM structures, archive in order to unambiguously explain the design to suppliers.
-Specify, re-design, replace critical components, integrate, qualify and optimize all the electronic aspects of the PAS 5500 modules in order to meet the system performance.
-Co-design and integrate test equipment and responsible for ensuring that prototypes are built and tests are carried out.
-Fulfill a technology bridging position between ASML headquarter & Taiwan & US and between the (new) suppliers in Asia and ASML.
-Ensure Electrical development & quality within multidisciplinary teams: responsible for the electronic content on Architectural till component level ( PCBA’s, Cables, Sensors, Racks ,Cabinets, electronic components)
-Solve End of Life & Product & Design issues on electrical products. Since part of the actual design is outsourced, your tasks include to define requirements, review detailed designs and integration and qualification of functional performance on both part and (sub-) system level
-Follow up MPS way of working, meanwhile associate with ASML headquarter to update current workstream by latest PGP and DE handbook if necessary.

Education
- Bachelor/ Master degree in Engineering with >5 years of working experience in technical areas and project management experience

Experience
- Some years’ experience with  PCBA, Rack, Cabinet design in a multi-disciplinary environment (equipment like measurement tools, positioning systems, multi-disciplinary assemblies, handling systems) international standards & human and machine safety. Also, familiar with Electro-mechanical integration. 
- Experience in Quality & Efficiency improvement projects in both the production - and development environment are an advantage.
- Experience in the usage of CAD tools (Autocad, Unigraphics (Siemens NX), DxDesigner/xDX Designer and Team-center) & SAP/Oracle is a preferred.
- Experience in Servo tuning is a plus.

Personal skills
-Ability to identify root causes and develop/drive solutions.
-Strong analytical ability with a pragmatic attitude.
-Team player able to convince others with different cultural backgrounds.
-Self-driven, pro-active, hands-on and get-it-done mentality based on technical arguments.
-Good communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to interact with people from all levels in a professional manner.
-Dealing with ambiguity
-Analytical, procedural, accurate and independent way of working.
-Sense of urgency and ability to prioritize
-Ability to think out-of-the-box
-Good English and Mandarin language skills.

job_name: 專案開發業務(林口)-PPC
cust_name: 漢通科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【漢通科技，始於堅實強悍的技術實力】

您是擁有足夠的經驗與跨領域知識
期望有場所可以發揮專業、理想與願景的人嗎？
若您具備電子組裝線管理經驗，誠摯邀請您加入！

我們力求組織文化的務實轉型。需要觀念開放、思考卓越的您，林口廠與華亞廠區，同時由一群年輕或資深、兼具穩健與開放的團隊組成，以堅實的製造相關學經歷背景，期望採取開放而自律的溝通文化，訴求自主思考與充份學習，在追求生產與程序的標準化之虞，也接納超脫於傳統的品質管理思維。

您若具備自律而自主思考，發揮您具備的長才，同時也保有學習初心，協助公司往更專業精深的技能領域前進，並對於組裝、機械、製造、知能工作有相當興趣，喜歡塑造團隊合作的默契與氣氛，我們渴望您的加入！

林口華亞廠，採乾淨明亮的冷氣廠房廠區、先進自動化設備、舒適的內外環境，準備導入標準化、建立完善教育訓練制度與各項程序，期望依照每項專業技能的進階，進行科學化的培育；扁平化的組織架構，期望未來在您的成長與薪酬有最迅速的反應，讓您在追求卓越的同時，更能符合對職涯發展的期盼！

本公司為求各層級人才，竭誠歡迎資深同仁與入門同仁，希望藉由新人的思維、與先進的經驗智慧，共創漢通科技 桃園團隊的新氣象！

【本職務主要工作描述】

1. 開發機構/電控/散熱等各模組整合需求之潛在客戶
2. 現有客戶擴增需求
3. 與客戶研發單位、採購單位協作
4. 交辦與提升業務助理工作效能
5. 提交專案收益與成本分析
6. 能以機構為基礎與採購/RD/電控/軟體單位協商合作

job_name: 【台灣半導體化學設備供應商龍頭】產品主管_客戶皆知名大廠_熟悉半導體產業佳_高升遷機會_職缺機會難得_AMR 861
cust_name: 藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
job_detail:
【公司簡介】
成立於1987年，立足於台灣微污染氣體過濾防治已超過30年，隨著台灣經濟發展轉型，於2000年切入高科技產業市場，陸續進軍半導體產業、記憶體大廠，面板、光電、封裝、電子、資料中心、車用、商辦、紙業、煉油、石塑化產業及太陽能大廠，已成為AMC微污染控制領導品牌，現跨足兩岸三地為台灣最大化學濾網專業供應商。

公司總部位於台灣的新北市，為提供客戶快速即時的服務，在中部科學園區、南部科學園區及中國上海均設有服務據點，目前主要客戶為台積電、桃園美光等全球晶圓大廠、面板與DRAM、封裝、石塑化等一線大廠，以先進思維走在產業前端，為客戶提供快速且創新的先進產品、包括可重複使用的低碳模組化商品、訂閱式商品等，未來也將佈局進軍歐美市場及消費者市場，將MIT商品與頂尖服務推向全球。

【工作內容】
1. 不定期拜訪客戶，確認客戶需求並提供業務團隊開發及維護方向
2. 協助業務同仁回答產品專業問題
3. 依據客戶需求開發、製造及導入新品，管理產品生命週期
4. 收集競品資訊、了解市場動向以貼近客戶需求
5. 負責與廠內生產、工程及品質部門溝通，以達成客戶需求為目標
6. 新品推動及現有產品維持。掌握市場趨勢與脈動，推動公司政策與滿足客戶需求，達到業績成長最大化
業務範圍：半導體、封測、面板、光電產業、電子業

※主要負責桃園地區，前期主管培訓須至中和辦公室

job_name: Cybersecurity Expert
cust_name: 香港商立德國際商品試驗有限公司桃園分公司
job_detail:
☉ Objectives:         
This position aims to provide advisory services to OT/ IoT customers with corresponding cybersecurity standards or national regulations, including development process, technical design, implementation, and risk assessment.

☉ Duties & Responsibilities:
-	Deliver cybersecurity training and gap analysis services to OT/ IoT customers
-	Conduct vulnerability assessments of OT/ IoT networks for cybersecurity, risk management, and/or compliance purposes.
-	Review the design and implementation of secure products and provide the essential advisory.
-	Resolve technical and cybersecurity-related issues, and be able to communicate with customers.
-	All other duties as assigned
-	Support Sales to visit clients to promote business 
-	Follow the company internal quality system and adhere to BV CPS quality requirements
-	Fully comply with the requirements of the Bureau Veritas Code of Ethics

☉ Skills and Requirements:
-	Reliable and Ability to perform multiple tasks.
-	Initiative and independence in solving problems and developing methods
-	Excellent interpersonal skills
-	Demonstrate strong written and verbal English communication skills.
-	Knowledgeable in Secure software development lifecycle (SSDLC)
-	Previous experience assessing against standards and frameworks such as IEC-62243/ISA-99, ISO2700X, NIST CSF, NERC CIP, TS-50701, EN 303645, ISO 21434, etc.
-	Experience working directly in industrial asset owners, service providers, or product suppliers.
-	Global Industrial Cybersecurity Professional (GICSP), Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), ISA/IEC 62443 certificates, Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP) or Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) Certifications
other:
☉ Education & Experience:
-	Bachelor's degree or higher in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science.
-	8+ years of experience in OT/IoT cybersecurity fields
-	3+ years of experience with software development 
-	Experience in the design and deployment of network security solutions and controls in industrial networks, including compartmentalization, network zoning, segmentation, and isolation designs.
-	Willingness to domestic travel up to 50%, or as needed

job_name: 電子工程師(車載產品)_林口
cust_name: GARMIN_台灣國際航電股份有限公司
job_detail:
Description
As a leading worldwide provider of navigation devices and wearable technology, our focus is on developing, designing and supporting superior products. Our advanced technology promotes performance, safety and ease of use in every market we serve. That As a leading worldwide provider of navigation devices and wearable technology, our focus is on developing, designing and supporting superior products.  Our advanced technology promotes performance, safety and ease of use in every market we serve. That makes us an engineering and technology company with a keen focus on recruiting talent in those fields. But the same vertical integration business model that keeps all design and manufacturing processes in-house also gives us the incentive to hire top performers from different backgrounds, including operations, finance and accounting, information technology, sales, marketing and communications.

At Garmin, you do more as an Electrical Design Engineer than sit at a desk working on schematics. You create. You build. You DESIGN. From building printed circuit board layouts to working with various equipment (multimeters, power supplies, oscilloscopes and more), you will work in a collaborative team environment and work on various projects.

Our Automotive OEM Engineering group is looking for a full-time Electrical Design Engineer to join their team in Linkou (林口) office. In this role, you’ll be responsible for performing schematic design, PCB layout, troubleshooting and debugging, using established design standards and procedures. Other essential functions include: 
◆	Create self-checking test cases to be used on the target hardware or simulation
◆	Collaborate and add value through participation in design reviews, providing comments and suggestions on design aspects
◆	Design test boards and circuit modifications to test design improvements
◆	Find technical root cause and suggest corrective action for given problems using sound problem solving techniques
◆	Source and analyze appropriate components to meet electrical engineering design needs
◆	Work with the factory team to understand design impacts on manufacturability
◆	Provide reliable solutions to a variety of problems
◆	Estimate level of effort, evaluate new options of similar technology, offer suggestions to improve processes, and provide comments on some electrical design aspects
◆	Use good communication skills

About Automotive OEM Engineering group:
◆	https://www.garmin.com/en-US/aoem/
◆	https://gadget.co.za/garminbmw/
major: 電機電子工程相關 通信學類
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
***如欲應徵請投遞履歷至 Garmin官網https://www.garmin.com.tw/careers/jobs/，將優先審閱面試資格***

Qualifications
Qualified candidates will possess a Master of Science Degree in Electrical Engineering or related field OR a minimum of 1-year relevant experience. Other requirements include: 
◆	Demonstrated ability with application of design standards and procedures to develop moderately complex analog, digital and/or RF designs including simulations, schematics, PCB layouts and evaluation
◆	Demonstrated ability with electrical engineering tools
◆	Demonstrated knowledge of design impacts on manufacturability

Collect feedbacks of stakeholders for follow-up improvement plans.

- Verify, feedback, discuss HW/SW requirements to provide recommendations.
- Usability review and test to improve design quality.

- Plan/conduct usability digital/hardware test to ensure user interface requirements are met. 
- Use mockups to test & verify usability concepts with test groups.
- Define ergonomics & usability guidelines.
- Design principles & directions & specifications to development team.
- Find new opportunity for products/applications

(一) 含著作目錄之學經歷履歷表。

(五) 博士論文（全文）及近五年內學術著作（全文）之抽印或影印本。
(六) 研究計畫書。

job_name: 龜山日照照服員
cust_name: 錸工場股份有限公司(錸德集團)
job_detail:
錸工場是一個嶄新的社會服務團隊，同事都好相處， 在照護理念上，我們取經日本，實施「減法照護」，如認同照護模式，有機會至日本受訓，學習機構經營管理與照護精髓，在工作上有極大的發揮空間，對個人職涯發展助益深遠。 歡迎對長期照護、老人領域、創新工作方法有興趣的你，加入我們的行列。

需具照顧服務員結業證書，無經驗可
1.活動帶領與協助 

2.日常生活復健活動 

3.協助身體照顧服務 

4.維持活動環境清潔 

5.主管交辦事項

福利服務-
1.績效獎金：為激勵員工努力達成營運目標，訂定績效獎金制度。
2.勞健保、退休金：依照法令規定辦理。
3.團體保險：包括住院醫療、意外醫療、癌症險、職災險，讓員工無後顧之憂。
4.健康檢查：定期健康檢查，維護員工身體健康。
5.員工旅遊：每年辦理員工旅遊/共識營，鼓勵員工享受假期、釋放壓力、凝聚向心力。
6.績效考核：每年進行績效考核，進行職級職等與薪資調整。
7.員工海外進修：每年提供海外進修名額供員工申請(須經評選)
8.三節禮券：勞動節、端午節、中秋節發放節日禮券或禮金。
9.年終獎金：依績效考核結果核發。
10.伙食補助：午餐由中心提供。
工作地址：桃園市龜山區華亞二路222號  (近林口長庚醫院)
other:
需受過照顧服務員訓練，取得照顧服務員資格者及長照小卡，無經驗可。 
完成失智症及身心障礙課程各20小時

job_name: 約用專員(空調水電)
cust_name: 衛生福利部樂生療養院
job_detail:
誠徵-約用專員(空調水電)
一、	資格條件：
１、學歷：高中職以上電子電機等相關科系畢業。
２、經歷：水電、消防、空調、高壓氣體工作經驗1年以上。
3、 具office相關應用軟體能力。
4、所需證照：具有水電空調或高壓氣體特定設備操作證照者尤佳。
二、	工作項目：
１、水電、消防、空調、高壓氣體設施設備點檢維修及緊急應變事項。
２、人員需配合輪(值)班。
３、其他臨時交辦事項。

三、	聯絡方式：
(一)意者請依序檢齊下列相關資料：
(1)履歷表(含照片、自傳) (2)最高學歷畢業證書影本(3)身份證影本（4）專業證照（5）經歷證明文件等影本，寄（送）達桃園縣龜山鄉萬壽路一段50巷2號，並請註明『應徵約用中級專員(水電)』），並註明日、夜間之聯絡電話及行動電話。
(二)合格者視學、經歷及專長擇優通知甄選，未獲遴用者，恕不退件及函復，應徵人員均不適當時，本院得予從缺。
(三)本次徵才得列候補名額1名，候補期間為3個月，自甄選結果確定之翌日起算。
(四)本院迴龍院區實施無菸政策，工作場所全面禁菸。
major: 電機電子工程相關 機械工程相關 電機電子維護相關

job_name: 電源研發工程師/T600(林口)
cust_name: 致茂電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
你知道你手邊所使用的電源測試儀器，絕大部分就是致茂電子所自主設計、生產製造的嗎? 包含直流電源測試儀器、交流電源測試儀器、直流電子負載、交流電子負載，為何高頻寬下仍可以適應多種類的待測物？現在的電源測試儀器不再是舊有印象，神秘而架構一成不變。致茂專精於電源測試儀器設計，我們有絕佳的團隊，以AC & DC單向功率儀器、線性負載長達幾十年的基礎，蛻變創新到今日的AC & DC雙向功率儀器，具備豐厚的設計能量。

致茂引領電源測試儀器的產業技術，而我們引領你進入更有創造力、高門檻的電源儀器產品設計，增添你的技術價值。如果你嚮往有豐富技術的學習環境，加入致茂，你可以將理論基礎結合於實務的產品上應證。如果在校、在職所學侷限，你可以在致茂學習到各種專長的電力電子架構，包含AC/DC；DC/DC；DC/AC等⋯功率範圍由幾十瓦到幾百千瓦的設計應用都有。如果你厭倦低成本產品的創新限制，你可以在致茂盡情發揮產品的高毛利設計價值。產品訴求可以使用在各種待測物，若你也對於控制系統有絕佳的興趣，可以挑戰我們在產品上的彈性設計、適性控制。如果你深盼研發能力能與學術連結，我們長年與學術單位密切合作，借助委託學術研究，隨時保持電力電子技術更新，具備高度產業競爭力。

當你不想屈就一成不變的電力電子產品研發，而對技術充滿求知，求新的態度。歡迎你加入電源測試儀器設計的行列，一同挑戰Source & Load雙向雙生設計、高功率密度設計、模組化設計、高精度精準量測等⋯產品設計特點。讓我們一同為電源測試儀器寫下歷史的紀錄。

主要工作內容：
1. AC Source、 DC Source、電源測試系統
2. Switching power supply 研發設計與測試
3. inverter、 converter 研發設計測試
4. 系統相關測試
5. 研發模擬設計
major: 電機電子工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
研究所主修電力電子領域
具電力電子相關研究開發經驗尤佳
2022新鮮人招募職務

DOSUN 品牌價值始終致力於自行車騎乘安全，堅信安全的夜間自行車活動不僅僅來自於充足的照明，而是提供所有用路人一個友善的用路環境後所帶來的安全體驗。 DOSUN從設計、研發、生產、行銷都致力於給消費者最好的服務。產品設計上，聆聽使用者的心聲與需求，將各系列自行車燈產品推陳出新，結合更多經驗以提昇各方面品質。 2021年開始DOSUN秉持品牌核心理念跨入電動輔助自行車。 以運動休閒為本質，利用本身對於深耕自行車產業的經驗及車燈電控上的科技。使自行車朋友們更能專注於享受騎車過程所帶來的感受，提供各階段年齡的朋友一個全新的生活體驗。 銷售服務上，在全球皆有與DOSUN合作的經銷商，不論您身在何方皆能為您提供最完整的服務。 遵循著LOGO的設計，結合燈與人的可愛圖騰，因為 DOSUN 深知「產品和技術應符合人的本性」，並依此理念努力打造移動式照明產品的領導品牌，持續發揚陽光、快樂、正向的 DOSUN 品牌優良特質。 

DOSUN品牌體驗館：桃園市
DOSUN品牌體驗館/辦公室：台中市大甲區
DOSUN品牌體驗館：高雄市鹽埕區

cust_name: 神達電腦股份有限公司

1. Be key player with sales team managing demand planning process to build an efficient way of forecast review and daily ad-hoc demand requirement communication.

3. Oversee Europe total sales outlook to highlight business gap and come out actions with sales team to close business gap.
4. Collect and analyze distributors & channels’ sales & inventory level and base on sales forecast to review if risk of excess/low stock and highlight to sales team for actions.
5. Establish a proper inventory strategy to maintain stock at optimal level and avoid business waste.
6. Deliver replenishment plan and shipment plan based on sales forecast and Europe warehouse inventory level and follow up shipping schedule to ensure on time delivery with adequate volume.
7. Based on replenishment plan to place demand/forecast to factory and control factory inventory in safety level.
8. Work with local sales to collect competitors and market information to analyze and judge reasonable sales forecast.
9. Europe E-shop price and stock management.
10. Shipping arrangement with warehouse & distributors.
11. Join sales field visit on regular basis to understand market situation in order to judge the rationale of sales forecast and optimize supply planning.

DOSUN 品牌價值始終致力於自行車騎乘安全，堅信安全的夜間自行車活動不僅僅來自於充足的照明，而是提供所有用路人一個友善的用路環境後所帶來的安全體驗。 DOSUN從設計、研發、生產、行銷都致力於給消費者最好的服務。產品設計上，聆聽使用者的心聲與需求，將各系列自行車燈產品推陳出新，結合更多經驗以提昇各方面品質。 2021年開始DOSUN秉持品牌核心理念跨入電動輔助自行車。 以運動休閒為本質，利用本身對於深耕自行車產業的經驗及車燈電控上的科技。使自行車朋友們更能專注於享受騎車過程所帶來的感受，提供各階段年齡的朋友一個全新的生活體驗。 銷售服務上，在全球皆有與DOSUN合作的經銷商，不論您身在何方皆能為您提供最完整的服務。 遵循著LOGO的設計，結合燈與人的可愛圖騰，因為 DOSUN 深知「產品和技術應符合人的本性」，並依此理念努力打造移動式照明產品的領導品牌，持續發揚陽光、快樂、正向的 DOSUN 品牌優良特質。 

DOSUN品牌體驗館：桃園市
DOSUN品牌體驗館/辦公室：台中市大甲區
DOSUN品牌體驗館：高雄市鹽埕區

job_name: Supplier Quality Program Engineer 供應商專案管理工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
職務影響力
致力於降低品質異常發生率，運用專案管理技巧與品質管理能力，跨部門溝通協調與團隊合作，以建立管理工具，追蹤組織內部專案進度並定義與優化流程。
 
 
工作內容
1. 依組職策略目標訂定管理計畫與管控機制，視組職優先目標與整體專案狀況，適時應變並彈性管理︒
2. 針對產品及零件PPAP承認進度管控和風險管理︒
3. 協助PPAP未完成或品質異常之特採流程︒
4. 持續維護與開發QPM系統︒
5. 協助廠內RMA檢提與申覆流程。
6. 透過數據分析持續優化供應商品質。
7. 擔任團隊內部窗口，協助彙整資訊與追蹤以達成團隊目標︒
 
需求條件
 1. 機械工程︑電機工程︑電子相關科系背景者尤佳︒
2. 具備三年以上專案管理經驗︒
3. 具備良好的邏輯架構與解決問題能力︒
4. 具備良好的溝通及表達能力，勇於面對挑戰︒
5. 具備主動積極的良好學習態度︒
6. 具備中等的英文聽說讀寫能力。

other:
我們是在拍賣、多類型網路平台上販售多種類型商品的公司，團隊成員有多年電商經驗。

這個職位的薪資採 底薪 + **高獎金**， 
依據個人接到的訂單數量計算獎金，你挑選販售的商品銷售業績亦有額外獎金發放。 


如果你在電商已有多年經驗，歡迎你前來與我們聊聊如何合作。 
如果你沒有相關經驗，只要你對網拍、網路行銷有興趣、願意學習， 
我們這裡也必定能讓你得到許多銷售與網路產業的知識，

DOSUN 品牌價值始終致力於自行車騎乘安全，堅信安全的夜間自行車活動不僅僅來自於充足的照明，而是提供所有用路人一個友善的用路環境後所帶來的安全體驗。 DOSUN從設計、研發、生產、行銷都致力於給消費者最好的服務。產品設計上，聆聽使用者的心聲與需求，將各系列自行車燈產品推陳出新，結合更多經驗以提昇各方面品質。 2021年開始DOSUN秉持品牌核心理念跨入電動輔助自行車。 以運動休閒為本質，利用本身對於深耕自行車產業的經驗及車燈電控上的科技。使自行車朋友們更能專注於享受騎車過程所帶來的感受，提供各階段年齡的朋友一個全新的生活體驗。 銷售服務上，在全球皆有與DOSUN合作的經銷商，不論您身在何方皆能為您提供最完整的服務。 遵循著LOGO的設計，結合燈與人的可愛圖騰，因為 DOSUN 深知「產品和技術應符合人的本性」，並依此理念努力打造移動式照明產品的領導品牌，持續發揚陽光、快樂、正向的 DOSUN 品牌優良特質。 

DOSUN品牌體驗館：桃園市
DOSUN品牌體驗館/辦公室：台中市大甲區
DOSUN品牌體驗館：高雄市鹽埕區

job_name: 電源研發工程師/6120(林口)
cust_name: 致茂電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
你是否厭倦了一成不變的產品開發工作? 對於技術的停滯感到不安?
「創新技術研發中心」集結了光學、機構、電力電子、類比、數位、演算法、韌體、熱流…等各領域菁英，持續關注業界新趨勢的脈動並專注於前瞻性核心技術的研究，以促成公司發展具精準、可靠、獨特性的世界級產品。在這裡我們常和各領域高手一起腦力激盪，既發揮長才更同時拓展橫向知識，也可透過產學研合作與外部各領域專家密集互動，更可感受到同僚間相互尊重、關心、協助與分享。如果你熱愛研發工作，喜歡創新求變，無畏技術研究的挑戰，歡迎一起加入我們的行列。

具體工作內容如下:
1.電力電子核心技術開發：需熟悉各種電源架構(AC/DC、DC/DC、DC/AC)之特性，具備數位電源控制經驗者尤佳
2.熟悉自動控制、電路學、電力電子
3.對電力電子未來技術、提高電源性能(高頻寬、低雜訊、高功率密度、高穩定度)有高度興趣，歡迎加入本團隊

job_name: 【WBU】WFT-場測工程部 -國際場測工程師 招募專案(需全世界出差)
cust_name: 耕興股份有限公司
job_detail:
[耕興新一波的招募培育計畫] 
各位求職者，想要年薪百萬也可以環遊世界的工作嗎?
只要您符合以下條件，歡迎加入我們，一齊走在手機通訊科技的尖端。 

以下為職務說明及條件： 
 1、工作內容為通訊產品(手機、平板、模組等)相關檢測： 按Field Trial測試規範指示的測 
       試方式進行操作並撰寫測試報告，以及追蹤、驗證問題。 

2、需具備條件： 
 (1)因測試需搭配文書紀錄，故必須熟悉Excel、Word等Office應用軟體。 
 (2)具備英文閱讀與溝通能力。
 (3)喜好手機類型的科技產品。 

3、成為一名Protocol/Field Trial/營運商入網測試工程師，您將能親身經歷我們生活周遭 
      看不見的複雜資訊傳遞，感受不同於任何教科書或資料能帶來的知識學習與成長。 

4、本職缺須配合前往歐洲、美國、澳洲、中國等海外國家，海外出差每日會給提供優渥的 
      出差津貼與膳食津貼。

job_name: Manufacturing - Lean Expert - Linkou - J-00265846-513
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
As a Lean Expert, you will co-lead the Lean transformation with local management and co-work with central team towards sustainable improvement, aiming at an overall breakthrough on cost effectiveness and inventory reduction according to the lean deployment roadmap defined and refined by an appropriate rhythm. You provide support through planning, execution and follow-ups on the deployment activities. Co-ordinate the necessary training and coaching to employees, including leadership teams, and build internal capabilities through train-the-trainer concepts. You respectfully challenge the status quo and act as a role model for Lean thinking, and thereby act as a change agent to help ASML’s LF sector advance on the lean transformation journey.

Role and responsibilities
Lead the culture change to a lean culture within Linkou factory towards sustainable improvement, aiming at an overall breakthrough on cost effectiveness and wastes elimination.
Responsible to work on hands-on improvement projects (A3, 4C, break-through initiatives) from identifying opportunities through utilizing/implementing lean methods and to visualizing benefits.
Deliver fact-based and structured communications to provide improvement project teams with support through lean activities planning, execution and follow-ups on lean deployment to drive continuous improvement of standards and way of working.
Provide training and coaching of lean principles and continuous improvement methodologies to employees, including leadership teams, to build up lean culture and capabilities.
Responsible to work with global teams on projects and performance reporting by face-to-face and teleconferences in English.
Conduct gemba walks and regular lean maturity assessments to advance operational excellence up to the next level.
Participate in strategic planning of lean deployment roadmap of Linkou factory.
Other assignments from management.

Education and experience
Bachelor or above.
Major in Industrial Engineering, Statistics, Engineering or Management related fields
8+ years working experience with hands-on and management in Lean, Six Sigma or Continuous Improvement categories
Experience in factory operations and semiconductor industry is a plus

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Project leadership, project management/facilitation skills, and good command of continuous improvement methodologies and quality management (for example, Lean, Six Sigma, DFSS, QCC/Kaizen, Tiered Process, TQM, ISO etc.)
Good team player able to influence without power
Courageous to challenge and proactively to give and seek constructive feedback
Communication skills at all levels
Good training and project coaching skills
Financial acumen for project benefits and cost analysis
Able to give presentations fluently in English and Mandarin
Green Belt or Black Belt certification around Lean and/or Six Sigma field is preferred
Application of Power BI is a plus

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

DOSUN 品牌價值始終致力於自行車騎乘安全，堅信安全的夜間自行車活動不僅僅來自於充足的照明，而是提供所有用路人一個友善的用路環境後所帶來的安全體驗。 DOSUN從設計、研發、生產、行銷都致力於給消費者最好的服務。產品設計上，聆聽使用者的心聲與需求，將各系列自行車燈產品推陳出新，結合更多經驗以提昇各方面品質。 2021年開始DOSUN秉持品牌核心理念跨入電動輔助自行車。 以運動休閒為本質，利用本身對於深耕自行車產業的經驗及車燈電控上的科技。使自行車朋友們更能專注於享受騎車過程所帶來的感受，提供各階段年齡的朋友一個全新的生活體驗。 銷售服務上，在全球皆有與DOSUN合作的經銷商，不論您身在何方皆能為您提供最完整的服務。 遵循著LOGO的設計，結合燈與人的可愛圖騰，因為 DOSUN 深知「產品和技術應符合人的本性」，並依此理念努力打造移動式照明產品的領導品牌，持續發揚陽光、快樂、正向的 DOSUN 品牌優良特質。 

DOSUN品牌體驗館：桃園市
DOSUN品牌體驗館/辦公室：台中市大甲區
DOSUN品牌體驗館：高雄市鹽埕區

job_name: 長庚大學學務處諮商輔導組資源教室誠徵資源教室輔導員 1名 （增聘第 3人） 。
cust_name: 長庚大學
job_detail:
一、工作內容：
1.身心障礙學生輔導服務及相關行政工作。
2.校園心理衛生活動推廣。
3.其他主管交辦事宜。
二、薪資福利: 由「 112年 教育部補助大專校院招收及輔導身心障礙學生 工作計畫 」支應。薪資 依本校研究計畫聘用人員薪級表 -專任計畫助理 (碩士 )起敘 (38,600元 )，具專業證照者每月給予津貼 4,000元 ，共計 42,600元 ，年終獎金 2.5個月。另有 節慶獎金、學校單身宿舍申請、 長庚醫院就醫優惠 、免費交通車等福利。
三、學歷及資格要求：國內外特殊教育、社工、諮商輔導、心理等相關科系研究所畢業，有學生輔導經驗，具專業證照 (社工師、心理師 )者尤佳。
四、聘任方式 : 112年 2月到職日起至 112年 12月 31日 (後續視工作表現及教育部經費補助情形聘用 )
五、有意應徵者請備齊以下資料：
1. 履歷 、 自傳 (含照片 )
2. 最高學歷成績單
3. 畢業證書 、證照 影本
4. 應徵人員個人資料蒐集告知條款及同意書 (請至本校人事室網站下載專區 →人事表單中下載 )
5. 其他有利文件證明 :英語能力檢定 、認證或相關經驗證明文件等相關書面資料。
六、資料收件:請於2月10日前以書面寄 (送 )達桃園市龜山區文化一路 259號長庚大學人事室麥專員 (信封請註明 [應徵 學務處諮商輔導組 資源教室 輔導員 ]) 或以電子郵件方式寄至 patrickpeng@mail.cgu.edu.tw。 其餘應徵方式，恕不審查或回覆。
七、招募通過初審者，將通知筆試與面試時間，不合者將不另行通知，應徵書面資料恕不退還。個人資料造假不實本校將取消錄取資格或予以免職。
八、學務處諮商輔導組 資源教室 聯絡人 彭輔導員 : 電話 : 03-211-8800分機2032；人事室聯絡人 :麥雯華專員，電話： 03-211-8800分機 3471。

job_name: Motor Design Engineer 馬達設計工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
Who We Are
一切緣起於一個革新能源使用與扭轉都市景象的念頭。為了看見改變，我們持續集結了許多領先技術及優秀人才。2020年，我們以前所未有的飛快速度成長，融入新點子、新面孔、新的夢想。我們不只是智慧雙輪公司，更不只是能源網絡公司，我們是車輛設計顛覆者、軟體應用潮流領導者，交通運輸方案的業界先驅。我們是Gogoro。

Meet the Team
Gogoro投注大量努力在乾淨能源的交通建設上，打造出符合大眾需求的智慧雙輪，賦予智慧移動新定義，其中，動力系統團隊所打造的動力系統，是Gogoro持續推動電動化的關鍵。動力系統內的馬達控制器高效率地將電池產生的能源轉移至馬達上，同時間與其他子系統間做大量的電子訊號傳遞，帶動車輛的運作，在穩定安全的能量輸出下，展現車輛的性能與智慧功能。
動力系統團隊由一群對動力與能源充滿熱情的成員組成，我們秉持專業、創新與團隊精神，持續精進我們的動力系統平台，致力於將智慧移動工具的動力系統提升到新境界。團隊的核心使命是將珍貴的能源高效率且乾淨地轉換為機械動力，取代相對低效、污染較高的傳統內燃機，以追求永續發展的城市環境。我們結合扎實的工程技術背景、創新的設計流程和智慧工具開發，打造更智慧、更安全、更高效的動力驅控系統。團隊影響力不僅發揮在Gogoro智慧雙輪革新的動力系統，同時也觸及商業夥伴，提供其完整的能源解決方案，期望在載具電動化上扮演驅動趨勢前進的角色。
我們有來自於各個領域的專家，如負責韌體開發的程式架構師、硬體系統架構師、電機磁路設計工程師、熱流系統架構設計工程師、先進機構設計工程師、車輛動力系統策略開發工程師等具有多年經驗的專業人員，互相合作、腦力激盪，開發出新穎可靠的全車動力系統。團隊成員除了透過參與國內外技術研討會、外部專業受訓課程與公司專案實戰經驗，以精進自身的技術能力外，也會學習到如何與不同領域的專家一起以產品系統、商業模式與消費市場的思維來設計產品與解決問題，致力於成為世界頂尖的動力系統團隊。歡迎對速度與動力著迷，想觸碰關鍵電動車核心技術的夥伴加入我們。

Position Impact
身為馬達設計工程師，你將運用磁路相關專業知識與經驗、對使用者消費需求及市場創新的敏銳度，持續探索技術突破，以宏觀的系統面角度，考量整體動力系統及其周邊關聯系統，推進馬達設計的技術前瞻性，將Gogoro動力系統往更輕量化、更高效能的設計提升。
你將使用馬達設計相關的工具及科學數據，包含馬達數學模型、有限元素分析、樣品測試評估及執行各種實驗討論設計參數，與傳動系統、散熱設計、馬達驅動控制、電池性能等成員緊密合作，從各面向探討馬達與其連動的部件或系統之間的影響。馬達設計工程師，是以整合性的高度，及對產業全球發展趨勢與技術新知的了解，提出有助商業營運及技術創新的動力系統策略。

Responsibility and Expectation
- 車輛開發階段，與產品規劃、車體研發、能源研發等團隊進行溝通與協調，提供技術面的建議，以設定符合整車特性目標的馬達需求規格。
- 根據所訂定的需求，運用數學模型，評估馬達的尺寸與性能，及操作有限元素分析軟體求得非線性的特性，以不同假設條件、演算法或是引用馬達相關的新技術，評估最合適的設計方案進行打樣。
- 部件打樣完成，和動力系統團隊內機構設計、硬體設計、韌體設計工程師合作，完成原型組裝、測試與調校。
- 作為對應供應商與製造單位之窗口，討論確認磁鐵規格與充磁頭需求，訂定磁鐵樣品與馬達的測試條件、手法與測試規範定義，確保供應商依規範完成相關測試。
- 應用馬達設計專業，與團隊成員合作，協助定義或優化產品研發規範與制度，撰寫相關技術文件，如設計報告、測試報告、工廠測試規範、DFMEA (Design Failure Mode and Effects Analysis 設計失效模式及後果分析) 等。
- 針對量產產品，解析製程或市場問題，評估替代物料與導入。
- 運用程式語言或其他方式製作相關工具，提升馬達設計、分析、測試、製作等流程之效率。
- 研究馬達設計領域趨勢與新技術，以強化品牌願景與精神為考量，評估新技術與新設計適用性，製作試樣，為馬達優化與創新建構基底。
major: 電機電子工程相關 機械工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
other:
Requirements
- 碩士以上電機、機械或機電相關領域學歷。
- 熟悉馬達設計基礎學理。
- 具備邏輯性思維。
- 具備實驗設計能力。

job_name: PA_軟韌體測試工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
職務影響力
致力於為 Gogoro 各項產品的軟體與韌體品質把關，包含車輛、換電站、電池、手機APP、網頁相關，並且與開發團隊緊密合作，執行設計驗證來提升程式品質與使用者體驗，成為 Gogoro 產品品質的守門員。

工作內容
1. 依據產品設計驗證手動執行測試案例，包含驗證規格、功能性測試、整合性測試、相容性測試
2. 閱讀需求與設計文件並撰寫或修改測試案例。
3. 架設測試環境與並以使用者情境模擬測試，挖掘出設計問題。
4. 回報問題並追蹤， 密切且深入地與開發團隊共同解析問題與驗證。
5. 分析測試結果並與團隊成員討論以提出改善建議。

資格條件
1. 電子電機工程或資訊相關科系或有軟韌體測試經驗者佳。
2. 善於團隊合作，能與夥伴建立良好溝通，表達需求且提供協助。
3. 邏輯思維縝密，細心且富有責任心。
4. 對測試過程和測試方法有良好的理解並有高度敏感度與執行力。
5. 喜好測試工作，喜歡找問題，解決問題，不倦怠於重複性工作。
6. 能夠適應高複雜度的工作環境，並維持工作水準。
7. 有中等的英文聽說讀寫能力。

language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等

job_name: 機構工程師(航海產品)
cust_name: GARMIN_台灣國際航電股份有限公司
job_detail:
-About Garmin Marine team-
Garmin是一間著重多元發展的跨國企業公司，涉足的領域包含車用、戶外健身、航空、航海等消費性電子產品，其中在航海領域Garmin已擠身世界第一大品牌多年，更是各大競賽的常勝軍。擁有豐富的產品線，從遊艇至商用漁船都能提供對應的產品，深獲消費者青睞！
在貨櫃、郵輪與遊艇三大航海休閒市場中，更是市佔率第1名！
Garmin的航海產品除了融入了引以為傲的GPS技術外，更以使用者的角度出發，推出了一系列包含聲納、雷達、船用多媒體及自動駕駛等全套的船用電子系統。
*航海產品｜https://buy.garmin.com/en-US/US/cOnTheWater-p1.html#

-About Mechanical Engineer-
1. 負責航海產品的機構設計開發，常與國外RD溝通
2. 尋找適當的協力廠商，並協助廠商解決機構問題
3. 協助解決產品設計與製造問題
4. 配合團隊team work，工作內容彈性調度

job_name: 人工智慧研究中心儲備編制內技士
cust_name: 長庚大學
job_detail:
一、工作內容：
(1) 中心設備採購驗收、管理及維護。
(2) 負責維護和營運資訊機房。
(3) 管理與維護中心網站
(4) 協助中心研究及開發專案。
(5) 其他主管交辦事宜。

加分項目
(1) 熟悉ISO27001:2003資訊安全認證，有實際參與認證者佳。
(2) 熟悉Windows Server及Linux作業系統操作，並有實際維運經驗。

二、 薪    資：依學校規定，大學畢業約40,750元/月(碩士畢業約42,180元/月)。

三、 學歷要求：大學(含)以上畢業。

四、 校外人員聘任及應徵方式：
(1) 錄取者先以約聘儲備技士聘任，經過一年的考核訓練通過且取得英文標準門檻證明(註1)者，則轉為正式編制內技士，考核未通過則終止聘約。
(2) 意者請備齊以下資料：
1. 履歷
2. 自傳
3. 最高學歷成績單
4. 畢業證書影本
5. 應徵人員個人資料蒐集告知條款及同意書(請至本校人事室網站下載專區→人事表單中下載)
6. 其他有利文件證明:英語能力檢定(多益分數達600分以上或全民英檢中高級初試及格或其他同等能力以上證明)、認證或相關經驗證明文件等相關書面資料。

五、 上述應徵資料，以書面寄(送)達桃園市龜山區文化一路259號長庚大學人事室麥專員 (信封請註明 [應徵人工智慧研究中心儲備編制技士]) 或 以電子郵件方式寄至su1126tw@cgu.edu.tw。其餘應徵方式，恕不審查或回覆。

六、 本次招募以隨到隨審方式進行，如找到合適人選即停止招募。通過初審者，將通知筆試與面試時間，不合者將不另行通知，應徵書面資料恕不退還。個人資料造假不實本校將取消錄取資格或予以免職。

七、 人工智慧研究中心聯絡人: 蘇珮錡小姐 電話: 03-211-8800分機3001；人事室聯絡人:麥雯華專員，電話：03-211-8800分機3471。

(註1)英文門檻：應取得多益分數達600分以上或全民英檢中高級初試及格或其他同等能力以上證明(英文同等能力評量標準以本校語文中心公告之英文畢業門檻實施辦法標準為準)。

DOSUN 品牌價值始終致力於自行車騎乘安全，堅信安全的夜間自行車活動不僅僅來自於充足的照明，而是提供所有用路人一個友善的用路環境後所帶來的安全體驗。 DOSUN從設計、研發、生產、行銷都致力於給消費者最好的服務。產品設計上，聆聽使用者的心聲與需求，將各系列自行車燈產品推陳出新，結合更多經驗以提昇各方面品質。 2021年開始DOSUN秉持品牌核心理念跨入電動輔助自行車。 以運動休閒為本質，利用本身對於深耕自行車產業的經驗及車燈電控上的科技。使自行車朋友們更能專注於享受騎車過程所帶來的感受，提供各階段年齡的朋友一個全新的生活體驗。 銷售服務上，在全球皆有與DOSUN合作的經銷商，不論您身在何方皆能為您提供最完整的服務。 遵循著LOGO的設計，結合燈與人的可愛圖騰，因為 DOSUN 深知「產品和技術應符合人的本性」，並依此理念努力打造移動式照明產品的領導品牌，持續發揚陽光、快樂、正向的 DOSUN 品牌優良特質。

DOSUN品牌體驗館：高雄市鹽埕區

job_name: Energy Engineering_Battery Mechanical Engineer 電池機構工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
Who We Are
一切緣起於一個革新能源使用與扭轉都市景象的念頭。為了看見改變，我們持續集結了許多領先技術及優秀人才。2021年，我們以前所未有的飛快速度成長，融入新點子、新面孔、新的夢想。我們不只是智慧雙輪公司，更不只是能源網絡公司，我們是車輛設計顛覆者、軟體應用潮流領導者，交通運輸方案的業界先驅。我們是Gogoro。

Meet the Team
Gogoro能源網絡提供使用者直覺、乾淨、安全、可靠、方便的能源交換系統，其核心的電池中儲存著驅動各式載具前進的能量，擺脫了纜線的束縛，Swap and Go。持續提升電池品質、安全性與便利性為Gogoro孜孜不倦努力的方向，每一個設計皆考量了使用者回饋與大數據，嚴謹且詳盡的產品認證代表著我們對於每顆電池的堅持。
電池機構設計團隊負責整個電池的材料選擇、結構強度、功能設計、安全認證、問題分析，偕同電力電子、軟韌體、電池特性部門，優化電池的容量、可靠度、與量產性，帶給使用者更佳的體驗。

Position Impact
身為電池機構工程師，你將致力於使用科學方法提升設計與解決問題，對於未知，從發想、設計到落實量產，建立假設、規劃實驗以求取答案，建立解決方案。透過與供應商、製造、品質團隊合作，制訂規格、開模生產、確保來料正確性、技術轉移及成品可靠度，同時協助取得各類國際認證，推動Gogoro能源網絡至世界各地。

Responsibility and Expectation
- 活用機械工程知識，結合理論與實務應用，以科學方法分析電池設計開發過程中之問題與現象，文獻、數據及資料支持，設計實驗確認問題根因，建置長效能、系統性的解決方案，並推導與驗證其功效。
- 建立跨部門協作關係，確實有效的共享資訊，以能源交換系統格局考量，綜合不同領域專業，共同創造設計上的最佳方案。
major: 工程學科類
language: 中文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通, 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
specialty: Matlab, Python, PTC Creo Elements/Direct, AutoCAD, Pro/E
other:
Requirements: 
- 大學以上工程相關領域學歷。
- 對機構設計懷抱熱忱。
- 具備基本電子電路知識。
- 擁有奔放且不被侷限的創造力。
- 具備問題解決能力。
- 具備資料收集及統整能力。
- 具備團隊意識，重視團隊成果及協作關係建立。
- 具備操作設計繪圖軟體能力，如Creo Parametric、ProE、AutoCAD。
- 具實驗報告整理歸納能力。
- 中文精通，英文略懂。
- 可配合公司需求短期出差。

除此之外，我們也希望人選具備以下幾項特質：
- 研發專案管理經驗。
- 熱流、結構分析相關經歷。
- 操作資料分析工具能力，Python、MATLAB等。
- 具備基礎電化學知識。
- 對能源產業有興趣。
- 具備駕照及汽車。

job_name: Powertrain Mechanical Engineer 動力系統機構工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
Who We Are
一切緣起於一個革新能源使用與扭轉都市景象的念頭。為了看見改變，我們持續集結了許多領先技術及優秀人才。2020年，我們以前所未有的飛快速度成長，融入新點子、新面孔、新的夢想。我們不只是智慧雙輪公司，更不只是能源網絡公司，我們是車輛設計顛覆者、軟體應用潮流領導者，交通運輸方案的業界先驅。我們是Gogoro。

Meet the Team
Gogoro投注大量努力在乾淨能源的交通建設上，打造出符合大眾需求的智慧雙輪，賦予智慧移動新定義，其中，動力系統團隊所打造的動力系統，是Gogoro持續推動電動化的關鍵。動力系統內的馬達控制器高效率地將電池產生的能源轉移至馬達上，同時間與其他子系統間做大量的電子訊號傳遞，帶動車輛的運作，在穩定安全的能量輸出下，展現車輛的性能與智慧功能。
動力系統團隊由一群對動力與能源充滿熱情的成員組成，我們秉持專業、創新與團隊精神，持續精進我們的動力系統平台，致力於將智慧移動工具的動力系統提升到新境界。團隊的核心使命是將珍貴的能源高效率且乾淨地轉換為機械動力，取代相對低效、污染較高的傳統內燃機，以追求永續發展的城市環境。我們結合扎實的工程技術背景、創新的設計流程和智慧工具開發，打造更智慧、更安全、更高效的動力驅控系統。團隊影響力不僅發揮在Gogoro智慧雙輪革新的動力系統，同時也觸及商業夥伴，提供其完整的能源解決方案，期望在載具電動化上扮演驅動趨勢前進的角色。
我們有來自於各個領域的專家，如負責韌體開發的程式架構師、硬體系統架構師、電機磁路設計工程師、熱流系統架構設計工程師、先進機構設計工程師、車輛動力系統策略開發工程師等具有多年經驗的專業人員，互相合作、腦力激盪，開發出新穎可靠的全車動力系統。團隊成員除了透過參與國內外技術研討會、外部專業受訓課程與公司專案實戰經驗，以精進自身的技術能力外，也會學習到如何與不同領域的專家一起以產品系統、商業模式與消費市場的思維來設計產品與解決問題，致力於成為世界頂尖的動力系統團隊。歡迎對速度與動力著迷，想觸碰關鍵電動車核心技術的夥伴加入我們。

Position Impact
身為動力系統機構工程師，你將轉化工程規格為實際的物體，透過數值計算與結構優化幫助產品是安全可靠且輕量化的，與開發工程師與供應商不斷討論與努力設計出可製造且成本合理的元件，讓整個動力的骨幹得以實踐。在速度  成本 與品質的需求下找出可以平衡三者的路線，以R&D的角色推動產品前進。
開發設計計算工具或整理設計手冊，與廠商及工廠討論提升製程品質與良率優化，提升工程專業評估的速度與準度，讓產品可以在有限的時間裡找出最佳的設計。
對於動力系統需保持好奇心，不斷吸收與分享業界相關設計來提升自身的設計能力，透過跨功能小組去腦力激盪出更好的新一代動力系統。

Responsibility and Expectation
- 依據IATF16949 產品開發設計驗證流程，與各單位合作進行產品機構開發。
- 動力系統相關機構設計(涵蓋 Motor / MCU / Transmission / Cooling / Wire harness)，須肩負從產品商務規格(性能與成本)，公司測試內部規範(環測 耐久)，展開為工程規格進行機構部件設計，過程需與產品設計師 車體工程師 CAE工程師共同合作討論，並依各階段產出 Drawing / DFMEA / DFM/ DFA / Design Report  / Bom / Cost Estimate 等文件與各單位溝通與滿足專案需求。
- 初期樣品發包/組裝與治具設計，包括部門內相關的實驗治具與研究樣品。
與產品驗證部門定義測試規範或建立實驗規範，必須對於消費者的使用條件可合理假設或掌握，並參考相關法規完成驗證項目，並在設計驗證階段完成RD 功能/耐久測試確認。
- 蒐集市場與工廠問題，提出最適設計來支援零件VAVE /同時也協助採購給予 2nd Source導入驗證計畫與工程規格確認。
- 機構力學分析，具備基本力學分析計算或是利用FEM軟體進行較複雜的模擬分析，可提出設計的安全率與改善對策。
- 設計完成與功能確認後，向供應商與開發人員準備製造可行性文件確認 / 測試驗證表確認 / 標準件承認測試條件，並Follow後續各種技術修改檢討，更新圖面設計。
- 設計後進行組裝模擬，並透過組車事件與工廠檢討進行設計改善或治具開發，協助工廠量產。
- 訂立動力系統機構維修手冊，並持續蒐集TEC端的意見進行修改，確認動力系統在良好的衛護下可以持續的運作，保障客戶的安全。
major: 工程學科類
other:
Requirements
- 具備至少3年交通工具或電機產業相關工作經驗。
- 具備完整產品設計開發案，從設計、製造、量產到市場回饋之經驗。
- 具備ISO五大核心工具 (APQP、PPAP、 DFMEA、SPC、MSA) 使用經驗，可幫助順利上手產品開發流程。
- 有電機 軸,定轉子,外殼,軸承,油封, 傳動機構設計經驗，並有工具輔佐量化安全率與壽命。
- 精通至少一款繪圖軟體 (NX/Solidwork ...etc.)，工作經歷仍持續使用CAD繪圖。
- Office工具精通 (Word/Powerpoint/Excel)，可獨立完成邏輯清楚報告與格式調整。
- 熟悉DFM金屬/塑膠材料特性與製造方法。
- 機構防水設計經驗 (O-ring/膠材/各式墊片)。
- 機械加工實務 (車铣鑽或鉗工等經驗)。
- 機械結構分析 (CAE軟體合作經驗  i.e. Anysis , Abaqus)。
- 機械組裝公差分析與設計。
- 能有效對設計進行成本分析評估與提出不同成本的設計方案。
- 對於工作負責可以自行管理手上任務，並主動與主管討論。
- 敢於面對困難問題、誠實紀錄現象，有耐心的解析並向相關人員說明進度與現象。
- 提出解析步驟或改善方案，有DOE實驗規劃實務經驗為佳。
善於分析與思考，在設計時能提出有組織的設計流程與方法，並且不斷精進設計工具與知識。
- 擁有良好的抗壓能力，能在時間壓力下冷靜完成任務且心態保持正向樂觀。
- 對於電動車產業充滿熱情與期待。

job_name: 【龜山】居家清潔人員-無經驗可/雙週領薪/可兼職，超高時薪，獎金優渥，時薪最高320，假日時薪加成40元-彈性排班(完整教育訓練)
cust_name: LEMON HOME檸檬家事_檸檬專業清潔有限公司
job_detail:
無經驗可，檸檬會從頭教起，提供完整教育訓練+實習，只要你有一顆刻苦耐勞的心
檸檬專業清潔秉持著”愛您家，如己家”的理念，用心服務每一位客戶。

◆工作地點：龜山區、桃園區周邊
◆工作內容 : 到府服務，居家清潔
★時間彈性，自行安排可上班時間，能兼顧家庭、生活

✮高額激勵獎金制度 :
超高時薪之外，還有額外獎金：
1.VIP獎金最高400元
2.每季激勵獎金，單次最高獎金1500元。
3.介紹獎金，揪親朋好友一起工作，獎金1000元。

✮完整教育訓練系統 : 
新人訓練課程、實務課程，幫助您成為專業家事達人，每月例會教育訓練增進專業技能。 

✮服務品質最佳 : 
經客戶回饋五星評價，成為令人尊重的檸檬清潔專業家事達人，顛覆傳統刻板印象。 

✮2人一組，保障個人安全 : 
除此之外還有意外險加保，讓您人身安全多個保障。 

✮儲備幹部培訓 : 
藉由工作中培養個人能力與特質，提供想與公司一起追求成長的夥伴一個良好的平台。 

✮不定期員工聚會 : 
檸檬清潔最重視大家庭的和諧，期待您的加入帶給公司更正面、更積極的影響。 

若你對檸檬有興趣，歡迎投遞履歷，我們會盡快與你聯繫

◆不接受與其他同業有承攬或雇傭之關係。


【為什麼要加入檸檬專業清潔？】
或許清潔服務不會是你工作的首選，大家對於居家清潔持有傳統印象，許多人投入之後便會發現，與想像中有落差，這工作比自已在家做家事還需更仔細，更專業，能學到一技之長，根據經驗，了解不同材質、污垢的清潔方式，也可以看到客戶滿意的笑容，有成就感的工作，自由度高，下班能吃到各區美食
other:
!!!請勿自行前往面試!!!
務必自備機車!!!! 
興趣者請投遞履歷

job_name: Energy Engineering_Power Engineer 電源工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
Position Impact
Gogoro電池交換站結合了電池交換、人機介面、電池充放電、資訊整合及能源管理等功能，在這些功能的底層，需要各種不同規格的電源供應電路，支持各種功能運作。身為電源工程師，你將成為此電源電路開發的關鍵推手，運用不斷更新的電力電子材料、零件、電源拓樸、數位控制等資源及技術，在設計開端的制定規格階段起，考量應用最佳化，兼顧性能與量產性的目標進行設計，如期、如質、如預算完成電源相關專案開發，使能源網路性能與穩定性持續提升，在技術面創新，提供符合品牌精神的使用者體驗。


Responsibility and Expectation
1.運用電子電機相關知識與原理，以電池交換站在能源網路為考量，設計各式AC-DC (交流-直流轉換器)、DC-DC  (直流-直流轉換器)、DC-AC (直流-交流轉換器)、bidirectional converter (雙向轉換器) 等的完整電源架構。
2.撰寫各種電源電路相關設計規格書，描述具體效能及設計細節、條件及測試規範，並考量系統面的規格影響，明確定義規格。
3.擔任ODM (原廠委託設計代工)、JDM (共同開發)、OEM (代工生產) 專案之技術審查及技術支援窗口，充分分析外部合作廠商的設計能力，掌握開發時程，搭配文件審核，輔以必要的廠內測試，確保合作夥伴在產品開發技術面之品質及可靠度，建立共同成長的合作關係，引導外部夥伴在產品開發上取得與公司品牌精神、營運方針間的一致性。
4.運用電子電機專業及分析解構能力處理技術相關問題，進行解析、追蹤，並提出改善建議，優化產品功能與使用體驗。
5.研究能源相關領域技術面趨勢，探尋可強化品牌願景與精神之新技術及知識，構思應用及評估導入至現行商業模式。
major: 電機電子工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
skill: 硬體工程技術開發, 硬體系統研發設計, 開發電子電路系統, 電子儀表工具使用
other:
1.碩士以上電子電機或電力電子相關領域學歷。
2.具備電力電子理論及應用相關知識。
3.具備電力系統理論相關知識。
4.具備電子元件理論基礎知識。
5.具備量測儀器設備基礎，如示波器、交流或直流電源供應器 (AC & DC Source)、電子負載、量測設備 (電表、資料紀錄器data recorder) 等。
6.良好溝通技巧與協作能力。
7.以分析性思維解決問題並提供結構性解決方案之能力。
8.處理複雜或不明確情境的能力，可化繁為簡。

12.語言需求為中文與英文。
13. 具備以下尤佳：
13-1 電源設計開發經驗。
13-2 具備通訊介面技術如USB (通用序列匯流排 Universal Serial Bus)、CAN (控制器區域網路 Controller Area Network)、RS-485、乙太網路 (Ethernet) 等相關開發或應用技能。
具備數位控制理論相關知識。

job_name: Corp. Service_Technical Support Engineer 技術支援工程師
cust_name: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_detail:
Position Impact:
技術支援工程師負責售後服務管理客戶問題，以確保Gogoro客戶售後服務遇到相關問題得到快速且滿意的解決，且持續追蹤，協助排除客戶整合產品過程時所遇到的問題。致力於指導和協助區域內參與客戶關係管理相關團隊，積極發現並改善客戶支援流程，維持高水準的客戶滿意度。
技術支援工程師主要參與Gogoro海外拓展售後服務客戶管理，並高度與全球銷售團隊合作，提供售後服務技術問題，提供解決方案，以利客戶在區域上經營Gogoro生態圈達到發展持久穩定經營。

Responsibilities:
1. 客戶技術問題處理與追蹤，協助排除客戶整合產品過程時所遇到的問題，提供卓越的售後服務品質。
2. 協助銷售團隊與客戶關於Gogoro產品運營時可能發生的技術問題，並提供建議。
3. 對於售後服務異常發生問題，主動進行分析及改善對策，降低客戶運營風險。
4. 高度跨團隊合作，有效提供最優質的售後服務體驗。

Requirements:
1. 大學以上電子/電機/機械等相關學經歷背景。具有客戶支援的經驗是一個加分的優點。
2. 可溝通的英語口語及書寫能力；
3. 以客為導向的態度，包括能夠與困難和/或沮喪的客戶合作。
4. 在動態環境中工作良好，適應不斷變化的優先事項，在快節奏的環境中有效工作，處理壓力情況，並做出適當的反應。
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

job_detail:
Who We Are
一切緣起於一個革新能源使用與扭轉都市景象的念頭。為了看見改變，我們持續集結了許多領先技術及優秀人才。2021年，我們以前所未有的飛快速度成長，融入新點子、新面孔、新的夢想。我們不只是智慧雙輪公司，更不只是能源網絡公司，我們是車輛設計顛覆者、軟體應用潮流領導者，交通運輸方案的業界先驅。我們是Gogoro。


Meet the Team
Gogoro Network智慧電池交換平台以更快速、更方便、更聰明的方式，為Gogoro以及PBGN (Powered by Gogoro Network) 中的智慧雙輪與智慧電車提供能源，GoStation電池交換站即是整個能源網路的起始點，賦予智慧電車生命力。
GoStation Electrical Engineering團隊負責設計建構交換站的硬體骨幹、系統整合開發與驗證。我們關心使用者的感受，專注在核心的電源開發，打造快速安全的換電體驗；並致力於運用電子電機專業，整合各種硬體線路，持續升級交換站，與專案管理、機構、韌體、軟體、能源網路營運端團隊高度合作，創造更友善的使用介面及更多的交換站應用。對於能源的使用，我們有許多不同的想法，並在我們建立的應用基椿上，與外部夥伴的合作關係中，教學相長，不斷地探索、學習，研究開發出創新的技術，激發能源網路最大的可能性。
團隊崇尚自由及當責並重的文化，鼓勵創新與勇於嘗試，堅守PDCA心法及對時程的承諾。面對嘗試創新過程中的失敗，我們快速調整，從每次錯誤中吸取經驗，成長優化。我們注重團隊合作，樂於分享，支援彼此完成每一次任務，為打造更完善的能源網路努力。


Position Impact
作為電池交換站研發電子電機工程師，你將致力以能源技術應用面為切入點，驅動能源網路營運模式的進展，以豐富的開發經驗啟發團隊創新發想，提供電池交換站相關策略，開發多元佈點方式及擬定不同商業模式如電力輔助服務等，加速超級電池交換站的建置，開啟交換站拓展至海外的可能性，降低海外佈建交換站難度，增加佈建效率，進而促進Gogoro Network取得營運面及營收上的優勢。


Responsibility and Expectation
- 運用電子電機相關知識與原理，進行電路設計、軟硬體整合及設計DC-DC (直流-直流轉換) 等的完整系統架構。
- 撰寫各種電源電路相關設計規格書，描述具體效能及設計細節、條件及測試規範，並考量系統面的規格影響，明確定義規格。
- 運用電子電機專業及分析解構能力處理電池交換站技術相關問題，進行解析、追蹤，並提出改善建議，優化電池交換站功能與使用體驗。
- 研究能源相關領域技術面趨勢，探尋可強化品牌願景與精神之新技術及知識，構思應用及導入至現行商業模式。
- 提供電池交換站海外佈點技術面建議及海外應用分析，提升能源網路建置效益。
major: 電機電子工程相關 通信學類 資訊工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
skill: 硬體工程技術開發, 硬體系統研發設計, 開發電子電路系統, 電子儀表工具使用
other:
Requirements
- 碩士以上電力電子領域學歷。
- 1年以上電子電機工程相關經驗。
- 具備電子元件理論基礎知識。
- 具備硬體開發專案端至端流程經驗。
- 具備設計規格書撰寫能力。
- 具備硬體線路繪製能力。
- 具備硬體線路除錯及測試驗證能力。
- 具備撰寫結構化分析報告能力。
- 具備建立BOM (材料清單，Bill of materials) 與確認正確性之經驗。
- 具備規劃系統整合測試驗證之能力。
- 良好溝通技巧與協作能力。
- 以分析性思維解決問題並提供結構性解決方案之能力。
- 處理複雜或不明確情境的能力，可化繁為簡。
- 事情優先次序判斷的敏銳度及變革的行動力。
- 概念式思考能力。
- 有彈性、可適應組織變化。
- 語言需求為中文與英文。
- 具備以下尤佳：
 ˙具備通訊介面技術如USB (通用序列匯流排 Universal Serial Bus)、CAN (控制器區域網路 Controller Area Network)、RS-485、乙太網路 (Ethernet) 等相關開發或應用技能。
 ˙具備量測儀器設備基礎，如示波器、交流或直流電源供應器 (AC & DC Source)、電子負載、量測設備 (電表、資料紀錄器data recorder) 等。
 ˙電動車充電椿硬體開發、系統整合或儲能系統產品應用經驗。
 ˙操作電路繪製軟體之經驗，如：OrCAD。
 ˙射頻相關模組開發經驗。
 ˙具EMC (電磁相容性，Electromagnetic Compatibility) 或可靠度驗證之經驗。
 ˙熟悉電子產品及電源零件設計驗證及可靠度驗證流程。
 ˙熟悉電子產品生產及測試流程，具備解決相關問題之能力。
 ˙具獨立進行硬體設計專案並實際量產經驗者尤佳。

cust_name: 神達電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Mio Cyclo is seeking a full-time product manager. You have a passion for cycling and touring and want to make people's lives better. You are an accountable, hands-on problem-solver with a positive attitude. You thrive when moving a project from ambiguity to clarity. If you're attempting this challenge, we would like to talk to you.

This role will own and lead all product-related tasks. Include execution and management, basic schedule, cost, regulatory approvals, packaging, and "front line" issue resolution management.

1. Define criteria for new products, including SKU, requirements, features, product ecosystem strategy, and product lifecycle strategy. 
2. Guide each product through exploration, proof of concepts, and bring it into the market.
3. Be aware of compelling technology and understand the tradeoffs for implementation.
4. Work closely with designers, engineering, and project manager on architectural and feature scoping to converge on products that are both incredible and pragmatic.
5. Drive launch planning and train sales, marketing, and customer service teams on new products.

job_detail:

2.	機器學習模型研究及實際應用開發
